titles.title: JP546 I can do all all all things

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Go to school: all things,
Obey the rules: all things,
Keep my cool: all things,
Through Christ who strengthens me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make new friends: all things,
Give and lend: all things,
Make amends: all things,
Through Christ who strengthens me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Pray and sing: all things,
Love our King: all things,
Everything: all things,
Through Christ who strengthens me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I can do all all all things,
Through Christ who strengthens me,
I can do all all all things,
Through Christ who strengthens me.
